data.text: Now I will sing a song about my dear friend,
My friend plowed the ground and cleared away the stones.
Now this is what Yahweh says:
What more could I have done for you
So, I will now tell you what I will do to Judah, the place that is like my vineyard.
I will cause it to become a wasteland
The nation of Israel is like [MET] the vineyard of the Commander of the armies of angels.
Terrible things will happen to you who continually illegally acquire houses and fields.
But I heard the Commander of the armies of angels solemnly declare this:
The vines on ten acres of land will not produce enough grapes to make ◄six gallons/22 liters► of juice/wine,
Terrible things will happen to those who get up early each morning
They have big parties and provide lots of wine.
So, my people will be ◄exiled/taken to other countries► far away
It is as though [PRS] the place where the dead people are is eagerly looking for more Israeli people,
Yahweh will get rid of a huge number of people;
But the Commander of the armies of angels will be exalted/praised because of his acting justly.
Then lambs and fat sheep will be able to find good grass to eat,
Some people constantly tell lies,
They make fun of God and say to him,
Terrible things will happen to those who say
Terrible things will happen to those who think that they are wise
Terrible things will happen to those who think that [IRO] they are great/heroes
If people offer them bribes in order that they will enable wicked people not to be punished,
Therefore, just like [SIM] fires burn up stubble
That is why Yahweh is extremely angry with his people;
Yahweh will send a signal to summon armies of nations far away;
They will not get tired or stumble.
Their arrows will be sharp,
They will roar like very strong lions [DOU]
Similarly, your enemies will roar when they see the people they are about to kill,
